languages.text: "В бездну Имперское кредо — ему не место на Футфоле. Теперь тут лишь один закон — абсолютная свобода. Все, кто с этим не согласны, могут отправиться погулять в шлюз".

traits.locale_text: "В бездну Имперское Кредо — ему не место на Футфоле. Теперь тут лишь один закон — абсолютная свобода. Все, кто с этим не согласны, могут отправиться погулять в шлюз".

languages.text: "To the abyss with the Imperial Creed. It does not belong on Footfall. From now on, absolute freedom will be the only law of this place. Whoever disagrees can head for the nearest airlock and take a walk into the void."
languages.original_text: "В бездну Имперское кредо — ему не место на Футфоле. Теперь тут лишь один закон — абсолютная свобода. Все, кто с этим не согласны, могут отправиться погулять в шлюз".

traits.locale_text: "To the abyss with the Imperial Creed. It does not belong on Footfall. From now on, absolute freedom will be the only law of this place. Whoever disagrees can head for the airlock and take a walk in the void."

"To the abyss with the Imperial Creed. It does not belong on Footfall. From now on, absolute freedom will be the only law of this place. Whoever disagrees can head for the airlock and take a walk in the void."

"To the abyss with the Imperial Creed. It does not belong on Footfall. From now on, absolute freedom will be the only law of this place. Whoever disagrees can head for the nearest airlock and take a walk into the void."

languages.text: “去他妈的帝国信仰，落脚港不兴这个！从今天开始，‘绝对自由’这四个字，就是这里唯一的法律。要是有谁有异议，就把他们丢到最近的气闸里，让他们去虚空里面散散步。”
languages.original_text: "To the abyss with the Imperial Creed. It does not belong on Footfall. From now on, absolute freedom will be the only law of this place. Whoever disagrees can head for the nearest airlock and take a walk into the void."

traits.locale_text: “去他妈的帝国信仰吧，落脚港不兴这个！从今天开始，‘绝对自由’这四个字，就是这里唯一的法律。要是有谁有异议，让他们到气闸那边，去虚空之中散散步。”

languages.text: 「帝国信条集とともに、奈落の底へ落ちろ。フットフォールにはふさわしくない。これからは、絶対的な自由のみこの地の法律となる。反対する者は一番近くのエアロックに向かい、虚空を散歩すればいい」
languages.original_text: "To the abyss with the Imperial Creed. It does not belong on Footfall. From now on, absolute freedom will be the only law of this place. Whoever disagrees can head for the nearest airlock and take a walk into the void."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国信条集とともに、奈落の底へ落ちろ。フットフォールにはふさわしくない。これからは、絶対的な自由のみこの地の法律となる。反対する者はエアロックに向かい、虚空を散歩すればいい」

languages.text: «Al abismo con el Credo imperial. No pertenece a Paso. A partir de ahora, la libertad absoluta será la única ley de este lugar. Quien no esté de acuerdo puede dirigirse a la esclusa más cercana y dar un paseo por el vacío».
languages.original_text: "To the abyss with the Imperial Creed. It does not belong on Footfall. From now on, absolute freedom will be the only law of this place. Whoever disagrees can head for the nearest airlock and take a walk into the void."

traits.locale_text: «Al abismo con el Credo imperial. No pertenece a Paso. A partir de ahora, la libertad absoluta será la única ley de este lugar. Quien no esté de acuerdo puede dirigirse a la esclusa y dar un paseo por el vacío».

languages.text: "In den Abgrund mit dem imperialen Glauben. Er hat auf Footfall nichts verloren. Ab sofort ist absolute Freiheit das einzige Gesetz hier. Wer anderer Meinung ist, der darf zur nächsten Luftschleuse gehen und in der Leere spazierengehen."
languages.original_text: "To the abyss with the Imperial Creed. It does not belong on Footfall. From now on, absolute freedom will be the only law of this place. Whoever disagrees can head for the nearest airlock and take a walk into the void."

traits.locale_text: "In den Abgrund mit dem imperialen Glauben. Er hat auf Footfall nichts verloren. Ab sofort ist absolute Freiheit das einzige Gesetz hier. Wer anderer Meinung ist, der darf zur Luftschleuse gehen und in der Leere spazierengehen."

languages.text: « Au diable le Credo Impérial, il n'a pas sa place à Castel. Désormais, la seule loi de cette station sera une liberté absolue et quiconque n'est pas d'accord sera éjecté par le premier sas venu. »
languages.original_text: "To the abyss with the Imperial Creed. It does not belong on Footfall. From now on, absolute freedom will be the only law of this place. Whoever disagrees can head for the nearest airlock and take a walk into the void."

traits.locale_text: « Au diable le Crédo Impérial, il n'a pas sa place à Castel. Désormais, la seule loi de cette station sera une liberté absolue et quiconque n'est pas d'accord sera éjecté par le premier sas venu. »

languages.text: "Yemişim İmparatorluk İtikadı'nı. Binliman'da öyle şeylere yer yok. Şu andan itibaren burada hüküm sürecek tek kanun, mutlak özgürlüktür. Karşı çıkan olursa en yakın hava kilidine gidip uçsuzda yürüyüşe çıkmakta serbesttir."
languages.original_text: "To the abyss with the Imperial Creed. It does not belong on Footfall. From now on, absolute freedom will be the only law of this place. Whoever disagrees can head for the nearest airlock and take a walk into the void."

traits.locale_text: "Yemişim İmparatorluk İtikadı'nı. Binliman'da onun yeri yok. Şu andan itibaren burada hüküm sürecek tek kanun, mutlak özgürlüktür. Karşı çıkan olursa, en yakın hava kilidine gidip uçsuzda yürüyüşe çıkmakta serbesttir."
